column1: Greetings from Turkey btw, where people just got beaten up for sitting in their own front lawns during Corona Virus lockdown. #PolisiminYanındayım #goes forcibly viral at this moment, meaning 'ı stand with my police' If U write something wrong, chances are high U get arrested
As long as explosive diarrhea isn’t a symptom of the #Coronavirus I won’t get them confused.
